name: HarryPotterAlarm
0:
”Alexa, wake me up at 7:00 AM to harry potter alarm tone”
”Alexa, set an alarm at 7:00 AM to harry potter alarm tone”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter alarm
des: Wake up to sounds from the wizarding world with the Harry Potter alarms pack, brought to you by Pottermore Publishing. Featuring sound clips from the Harry Potter audiobooks, narrated by the incredible Jim Dale, we can’t promise a gentle awakening every day, but we can guarantee that our specially selected snippets will see your mornings begin with wake-up calls from characters including Hermione Granger, Professor Snape and Harry Potter himself – and of course everyone’s favourite house-elf, Dobby. With seven alarm clips and two snooze clips (we all know one snooze is never enough), the Harry Potter alarms pack is sure to give your ears a treat. The full audiobooks are available from audible.com.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
